languages.text: {n}Груда человеческих останков, небрежно сваленных в единую кучу, издает удушающую вонь. Разорванные, распотрошенные тела некогда принадлежали {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецам{/g}, но, куда бы вы ни бросили взгляд, вы не замечаете отблеска металла: все {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланты{/g} бесследно исчезли. Неожиданно одно из выпотрошенных тел слабо шевелится. Губы мученика едва заметно движутся, а на полуприкрытых глазах трепещут веки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Груда человеческих останков, небрежно сваленных в единую кучу, издает удушающую вонь. Разорванные, распотрошенные тела некогда принадлежали {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецам{/g}, но, куда бы вы ни бросили взгляд, вы не замечаете отблеска металла: все {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланты{/g} бесследно исчезли. Неожиданно одно из выпотрошенных тел слабо шевелится. Губы мученика едва заметно движутся, а на полуприкрытых глазах трепещут веки.{/n}

languages.text: {n}This pile of human remains, carelessly tossed together, emits a suffocating stench. The torn, gutted bodies once belonged to {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}, but you cannot spot even a glint of metal anywhere — all their {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are gone. Suddenly, one of the ravaged bodies makes the tiniest movement. The tortured man's lips move ever so slightly, his half-closed eyelids twitching.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Груда человеческих останков, небрежно сваленных в единую кучу, издает удушающую вонь. Разорванные, распотрошенные тела некогда принадлежали {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецам{/g}, но, куда бы вы ни бросили взгляд, вы не замечаете отблеска металла: все {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланты{/g} бесследно исчезли. Неожиданно одно из выпотрошенных тел слабо шевелится. Губы мученика едва заметно движутся, а на полуприкрытых глазах трепещут веки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}This pile of human remains, carelessly tossed together, emits a suffocating stench. The torn, gutted bodies once belonged to Tech-Priests, but you cannot spot even a glint of metal anywhere — all their implants are gone. Suddenly, you detect movement — it seems that one of the ravaged bodies is not lifeless just yet. The tortured man's lips move ever so slightly, and his half-closed eyelids are twitching.{/n}

Suddenly, you detect movement — it seems that one of the ravaged bodies is not lifeless just yet. The tortured man's lips move ever so slightly, and his half-closed eyelids are twitching.{/n}

{n}This pile of human remains, carelessly tossed together, emits a suffocating stench. The torn, gutted bodies once belonged to {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}, but you cannot spot even a glint of metal anywhere — all their {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are gone. Unexpectedly, it seems that one of the ravaged bodies is still moving weakly. The tortured man's lips move ever so slightly, his half-closed eyelids twitching.{/n}

{n}This pile of human remains, carelessly tossed together, emits a suffocating stench. The torn, gutted bodies once belonged to {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}, but you cannot spot even a glint of metal anywhere — all their {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are gone. Suddenly, one of the ravaged bodies makes the tiniest movement. The tortured man's lips move ever so slightly, his half-closed eyelids twitching.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这堆人类的残骸被乱七八糟地堆在一起，散发出令人窒息的恶臭。这些残骸曾是{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}被撕碎的肉体，但你无法在这座尸堆任何地方看到哪怕一丝金属的光芒，他们身上所有的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}都不见了。突然，其中一具已经扭曲变形尸体微微抽动了一下。那个惨遭折磨的人嘴唇微微翕动，半闭的眼睛抽搐着。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This pile of human remains, carelessly tossed together, emits a suffocating stench. The torn, gutted bodies once belonged to {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}, but you cannot spot even a glint of metal anywhere — all their {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are gone. Suddenly, one of the ravaged bodies makes the tiniest movement. The tortured man's lips move ever so slightly, his half-closed eyelids twitching.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这堆人类的残骸被乱七八糟地堆在一起，散发出令人窒息的恶臭。这些残骸曾是{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}被撕碎的肉体，但你无法在这座尸堆任何地方看到哪怕一丝金属的光芒，他们身上所有的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}都不见了。突然，其中一具已经扭曲变形尸体微微抽动了一下。那个惨遭折磨的人嘴唇微微翕动，半闭的眼睛抽搐着。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La pila de restos humanos, apilados sin miramiento ninguno, expide un hedor asfixiante. Los cuerpos desmembrados y destripados pertenecían a {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g}, pero no ves ni rastro de metal por ninguna parte: todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} han desaparecido. De pronto, uno de los cuerpos devastados se mueve de manera casi imperceptible. Los labios del hombre torturado se mueven levemente; sus párpados entrecerrados hacen el amago de parpadear.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This pile of human remains, carelessly tossed together, emits a suffocating stench. The torn, gutted bodies once belonged to {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}, but you cannot spot even a glint of metal anywhere — all their {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are gone. Suddenly, one of the ravaged bodies makes the tiniest movement. The tortured man's lips move ever so slightly, his half-closed eyelids twitching.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La pila de restos humanos, apilados sin miramiento ninguno, expide un hedor asfixiante. Los cuerpos desmembrados y destripados pertenecían a {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g}, pero no ves ni rastro de metal por ninguna parte: todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} han desaparecido. De pronto, uno de los cuerpos devastados se mueve de manera casi imperceptible. Los labios del hombre torturado se mueven levemente; sus párpados entrecerrados hacen el amago de parpadear.{/n}

languages.text: {n}は雑に投げ捨てられた人骨の山は、むせるような悪臭を放っている。バラバラにされて中身を抜かれた死体は、かつての{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}のものだった。しかし、どこにもきらめく金属は見当たらない。{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}は、すべげてなくなっている。不意に、メチャクチャにされた体のひとつがかすかに動く。拷問を受けた男の唇がほんの少し動き、半開きの瞼がピクピク動いている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This pile of human remains, carelessly tossed together, emits a suffocating stench. The torn, gutted bodies once belonged to {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}, but you cannot spot even a glint of metal anywhere — all their {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are gone. Suddenly, one of the ravaged bodies makes the tiniest movement. The tortured man's lips move ever so slightly, his half-closed eyelids twitching.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}は雑に投げ捨てられた人骨の山は、むせるような悪臭を放っている。バラバラにされて中身を抜かれた死体は、かつての{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}のものだった。しかし、どこにもきらめく金属は見当たらない。{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}は、すべげてなくなっている。不意に、メチャクチャにされた体のひとつがかすかに動く。拷問を受けた男の唇がほんの少し動き、半開きの瞼がピクピク動いている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dieser Haufen menschlicher Überreste, achtlos zusammengeworfen, stinkt bestialisch. Die zerrissenen, ausgeweideten Leichen waren {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g}, aber du kannst nirgendwo auch nur eine Spur von Metall entdecken – sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantate{/g} sind weg. Plötzlich macht einer der malträtierten Körper eine winzige Bewegung. Die Lippen des geschundenen Mannes zittern, seine halb geschlossenen Augenlider zucken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This pile of human remains, carelessly tossed together, emits a suffocating stench. The torn, gutted bodies once belonged to {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}, but you cannot spot even a glint of metal anywhere — all their {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are gone. Suddenly, one of the ravaged bodies makes the tiniest movement. The tortured man's lips move ever so slightly, his half-closed eyelids twitching.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dieser Haufen menschlicher Überreste, achtlos zusammengeworfen, stinkt bestialisch. Die zerrissenen, ausgeweideten Leichen waren {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g}, aber du kannst nirgendwo auch nur eine Spur von Metall entdecken – sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantate{/g} sind weg. Plötzlich macht einer der malträtierten Körper eine winzige Bewegung. Die Lippen des geschundenen Mannes zittern, seine halb geschlossenen Augenlider zucken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ce tas de cadavres, jetés négligemment les uns sur les autres, dégage une odeur suffocante. Les corps lacérés ou éventrés étaient ceux de {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g}, mais vous ne distinguez pas la moindre lueur de métal parmi eux... tous leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} ont disparu. Soudain, l'un des corps mutilés se met à bouger de façon presque imperceptible. Les lèvres de l'homme torturé remuent faiblement tant que ses yeux mi-clos tressaillent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This pile of human remains, carelessly tossed together, emits a suffocating stench. Suddenly, one of the ravaged bodies makes the tiniest movement. The tortured man's lips move ever so slightly, his half-closed eyelids twitching.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ce tas de cadavres, jetés négligemment les uns sur les autres, dégage une odeur suffocante. Les corps lacérés ou éventrés étaient ceux de {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g}, mais vous ne distinguez pas la moindre lueur de métal parmi eux... tous leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} ont disparu. Soudain, l'un des corps mutilés se met à bouger de façon presque imperceptible. Les lèvres de l'homme torturé remuent faiblement tant que ses yeux mi-clos tressaillent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Fütursuzca bir araya getirilmiş bu insan kalıntıları, boğucu bir koku yayıyor. Bir zamanlar {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahiplere{/g} ait bu yırtılmış, parçalanmış bedenlerde tek bir metal parıltısı bile göremiyorsun... Tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantları{/g} gitmiş. Harap olmuş bedenlerden biri aniden ufacık bir hareket yapıyor. İşkence çeken adamın dudakları o kadar hafif hareket ediyor ki yarı kapalı göz kapakları seğiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This pile of human remains, carelessly tossed together, emits a suffocating stench. Suddenly, one of the ravaged bodies makes the tiniest movement. The tortured man's lips move ever so slightly, his half-closed eyelids twitching.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Fütursuzca bir araya getirilmiş bu insan kalıntıları, boğucu bir koku yayıyor. Bir zamanlar {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahipler{/g}e ait bu yırtılmış, parçalanmış bedenlerde tek bir metal parıltısı bile göremiyorsun... Tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantlar{/g}ı gitmiş. Harap olmuş bedenlerden biri aniden ufacık bir hareket yapıyor. İşkence çeken adamın dudakları o kadar hafif hareket ediyor ki yarı kapalı göz kapakları seğiriyor.{/n}
